title: Signature presumed authentic
context: [ยง231-15.3] Signature presumed authentic. The fact that an individual&rsquo;s name is signed on a return, statement, or other document shall be prima facie evidence for all purposes that the return, statement, or other document was actually signed by the individual. [L 2009, c 166, pt of ยง16] Note Applicability of section. L 2009, c 166, ยง27.
